entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - C:\Users\David\AppData\Local\Temp\tmpzsif_vhn\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0011.6821] It is expected that AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDefinedBenefitPensionAndOtherPostretirementPlansNetOfTax with a value of 5,000,000 reported in the network role http://www.windstream.com/role/AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveLossIncomeDetails should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest with the dimension us-gaap:StatementEquityComponentsAxis = us-gaap:AccumulatedDefinedBenefitPlansAdjustmentMember and a reported value of 5,000,000 multiplied by -1. This value appears in the network role http://www.windstream.com/role/AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveLossIncomeRollForwardDetails. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this us-gaap:AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDefinedBenefitPensionAndOtherPostretirementPlansNetOfTax fact are:
Period : 2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDefinedBenefitPensionAndOtherPostretirementPlansNetOfTax : -5 Decimals of StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest : -5 Rule version: 13.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1282266/000128226620000031/a2020033110q.htm 4011

property.name: label
property.value: Accumulated Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, after Tax
